Hospital.Controllers

Class WareHouseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.LoginController<WarehouseManager>
      • Hospital.Controllers.WareHouseController

  • public class WareHouseController
extends LoginController<WarehouseManager>
    This controller handles the login of a warehousemanager. This Controller enables the following usecases: Process orders : get a list of all orders and process them List orders : returns a list of all current orders

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ORDERS_TO_SHOW
      defines the maximum amount of orders to show when asking for an order history

    • Method Detail

      • getStockCategories

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getStockCategories()
                                                   throws NotLoggedInException
        Returns a list of the different stock categories
        Returns:
        a list of strings representing the stock categories
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - The Warehousemanager is not logged in

      • getOrderArguments

        public PublicArgument[] getOrderArguments(java.lang.String order)
                                   throws NotLoggedInException,
                                          OrderUnavailableException,
                                          StockException
        Returns the arguments needed to process the order. This is the expiration date if needed.
        Parameters:
        order - the order.
        Returns:
        a list of arguments that are needed to process the order. an empty list in case there are no arguments needed.
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - The Warehousemanager is not logged in.
        OrderUnavailableException - the order was not found in this warehouse
        StockException - this order was not in the correct warehouse

      • processOrder

        public java.lang.String processOrder(java.lang.String order,
                            PublicArgument[] arg)
                              throws OrderUnavailableException,
                                     StockException,
                                     WrongArgumentListException,
                                     NotLoggedInException,
                                     InvalidArgumentException
        This method will process the order. It will create the items and add them to the warehouse.
        Parameters:
        order - the order to process.
        arg - the arguments needed to process the order. Use the method getOrderArguments to get the correct arguments.
        Returns:
        a string detailing the processed order
        Throws:
        OrderUnavailableException - the order o is not registered in the system.
        StockException - the stock was full
        WrongArgumentListException - one of the arguments in arg is wrong
        NotLoggedInException - The Warehousemanager is not logged in.
        InvalidArgumentException - thrown if the list or one of the arguments is null, or if the answer does not satisfy the constraints.

      • getLatestOrders

        public java.lang.String[] getLatestOrders(java.lang.String stockName)
                                   throws NotLoggedInException
        Gets the latest ORDERS_TO_SHOW orders of a given type
        Parameters:
        stockName - the type of order to search
        Returns:
        an array of strings containing the details of the last 20 orders of the given type
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - the warehousemanager is not logged in

      • getArrivedOrders

        public java.lang.String[] getArrivedOrders(java.lang.String category)
                                    throws NotLoggedInException
        Gets all orders in the given category
        Parameters:
        category - the category of orders to search
        Returns:
        all orders in the given category as an array of strings
        Throws:
        NotLoggedInException - the warehouse manager is not logged in
